description: KÜHL’s exclusive REFLEX™ fabric brings its new level of comfort and performance to the Men’s SILENCR™ KARGO Short. With plenty of durability and stretch, these versatile cargos also provide water resistance and maximum sun protection (UPF 50+).
name: Kuhl Silencr Kargo Shorts, 12" Inseam - Mens

specs.value: Reflex Softshell - 56% New Polyester, 44% Polyester - 164 g
two front hand, two side with zipper closure, two back, one stealth cell phone pocket
